paper.title: Permutation of transitions: An event structure semantics for CCS and SCCS
paper.venue: Linear Time, Branching Time and Partial Order in Logics and Models for Concurrency, School/Workshop
paper.abstract: We apply Berry u0026 Levyu0027s notion of equivalence by permutations to CCS and Meije/SCCS, thus obtaining a pomset transition semantics for these calculi. We show that this provides an operational counterpart for an event structure semantics for CCS and SCCS similar to the one given by Winskel.
